description: A cosplay-based maid dress, black with a frilly white apron and miniskirt.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A more traditional maid dress, black with a frilly white apron.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A frilly white hat meant to keep a maid's hair from getting dirty while she works.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A working lady's made dress, reinforced with leather, and full of pockets.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A custom camo maid dress, reinforced with kevlar and leather. It only has a miniskirt, but its super protective.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A futuristic, sleeveless maid dress, made of rubber and metal. It's meant to show off one's bionics, and thus isnt quite as covering as other outfits. Its still incredibly frilly.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: pair of XL cyberpunk maid boots
name.str_pl: pairs of XL cyberpunk maid boots

description: Very long, rubbery boots worn by cyberpunk maids. Theyre incredibly protective.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A frilly white headpiece, held to your head by little metal ear coverings, resembling elf ears.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
